H0.text: where did the beer hall putsch take place. Berlin, Germany

H1.text: where did the beer hall putsch take place. Hamburg, Germany

H3.text: where did the beer hall putsch take place. Munich , Bavaria

A4.text: The Beer Hall Putsch... was a failed coup d'état by Nazi Party leader Adolf Hitler... in Munich, Bavaria...

A5.text: One of Munich's largest beer halls was the Bürgerbräukeller, which became the site where the putsch began.
